Name: Find broken links
Description: Can I find links on a page that return Error 404, 500?
Author: @pankajparashar

Notes: 1. Open DevTools panel (`Cmd/Ctrl+Shift+P`) > Info > Outline. Select "Links" from the dropdown menu at the top.
2. Scroll through the list of links to identify broken links reporting status code with 404, 500.
